body:
The update is being reconsidered.

In light of our recent promotions a few updates will be done in the near future:


  • First of all, we will be making the nightclub chats donator only. This will help clear up much of the offensive behavior occurring on TeamSpeak as well as helping the server with donations. Since all of this behavior would take place in the suites it gives the TeamSpeak server more of a positive attitude.


  • Due to public nightclub chats being deleted we will be adding a Spanish Nightclub Suite.


  • We have also updated the Team Chat requirements:

    • At least 10 active players who are not banned.

    • At least 10 logged scrimmages.

    • 10 Players with over 24 hours of ingame time (who are not banned).

    • 10 Players with at least 2500 kills, or 100 objectives (who are not banned).

    • Official consent (At Least 2). (In the event that a Head of Teamspeak sees fit, we can approve/deny your request for a channel.)

    • Failure to be active on your channel will result in a reconsideration of whether it should remain.


The Cursing allowed chats’ rules will be updated to balance out the change with the Nightclub Chats. The chat will be set up where 18+ conversation can take place however none of the offensive behavior that is currently allowed in nightclub. More information on the specific rule set will be give out at a later time.


EDIT: We will be testing this for about a week or so.


-The TeamSpeak Development Team.
body_tagged:
The update is being reconsidered.

In light of our recent promotions a few updates will be done in the near future:


  • First of all, we will be making the nightclub chats donator only. This will help clear up much of the offensive behavior occurring on TeamSpeak as well as helping the server with donations. Since all of this behavior would take place in the suites it gives the TeamSpeak server more of a positive attitude.


  • Due to public nightclub chats being deleted we will be adding a Spanish Nightclub Suite.


  • We have also updated the Team Chat requirements:

    • At least 10 active players who are not banned.

    • At least 10 logged scrimmages.

    • 10 Players with over 24 hours of ingame time (who are not banned).

    • 10 Players with at least 2500 kills, or 100 objectives (who are not banned).

    • Official consent (At Least 2). (In the event that a Head of Teamspeak sees fit, we can approve/deny your request for a channel.)

    • Failure to be active on your channel will result in a reconsideration of whether it should remain.


The Cursing allowed chats’ rules will be updated to balance out the change with the Nightclub Chats. The chat will be set up where 18+ conversation can take place however none of the offensive behavior that is currently allowed in nightclub. More information on the specific rule set will be give out at a later time.


EDIT: We will be testing this for about a week or so.


-The TeamSpeak Development Team.
title: [Redacted]TeamSpeak Update

replies.body: This seems interesting and a nice concept! I'm glad you got mod and Teamspeak Dev!
replies.body_tagged: This seems interesting and a nice concept! I'm glad you got mod and Teamspeak Dev!

replies.body:
Rip Nightclub chat :/ why though?
How does making it donator only help?
replies.body_tagged:
Rip Nightclub chat :/ why though?
How does making it donator only help?

replies.body: It helps by keeping the chats new users would join, PG-13ish and if that player wishes to be in an environment like nightclub they can donate. It also stops people from being forced into a chat in which they do not feel comfortable so that they are not just in a chat by themselves.
replies.body_tagged: It helps by keeping the chats new users would join, PG-13ish and if that player wishes to be in an environment like nightclub they can donate. It also stops people from being forced into a chat in which they do not feel comfortable so that they are not just in a chat by themselves.

replies.body:
I like you Viper but as a personal opinion, I don't a think the "night club" or 18+ channels are needed, like adding this channels is an excuse to be allowed to be a dick with people, this can be bad.
Also people can do any of these things in any channel, and it's not like a mod is always checking how they are talking. it's just that of course most people won't use insults with people they don't know or don't have enough confidense but at least if you are confident with someone, it doesn't matter wherever you wre you might use insults because at the end you are friends

replies.body: We are trying to crack down on mods dealing with TeamSpeak punishments more often so we don't need to worry about that. I do see you point though but as long as there is staff there it won't happen. It can always be reported to a staff member.

replies.body: Why would you even think about making it for only donators? How is that going to fix the problem, because most of the people with colourful language aren't donators? Just keep it how it is, as there is a broad range of attitudes on the TS server. Let those who are naturally rude and swear uncontrollably be in the Nightclub, those who swear in and out in the Cursing Allowed, and those with clean mouthes use the Cursing Forbidden. Honesty, just keep it how it is.
replies.body_tagged: Why would you even think about making it for only donators? How is that going to fix the problem, because most of the people with colourful language aren't donators? Just keep it how it is, as there is a broad range of attitudes on the TS server. Let those who are naturally rude and swear uncontrollably be in the Nightclub, those who swear in and out in the Cursing Allowed, and those with clean mouthes use the Cursing Forbidden. Honesty, just keep it how it is.

replies.body: There is a difference between having colorful language and being offensive. With the current rule set of Nightclub chats it allows this offensive behavior. We want to limit it when possible by making Nightclub donor only so if you really have a need to be offensive to others just buy a rank.
